text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) HKUDS/nanobot | 96% | stars now 16451 → est 32216 (range 32138-32294)
   https://github.com/HKUDS/nanobot
2) qwibitai/nanoclaw | 95% | stars now 7005 → est 13270 (range 13223-13317)
   https://github.com/qwibitai/nanoclaw
3) Leey21/awesome-ai-research-writing | 94% | stars now 5368 → est 9626 (range 9585-9667)
   https://github.com/Leey21/awesome-ai-research-writing
4) The-Vibe-Company/companion | 93% | stars now 1482 → est 4939 (range 4914-4964)
   https://github.com/The-Vibe-Company/companion
5) op7418/CodePilot | 93% | stars now 1642 → est 4870 (range 4845-4895)
   https://github.com/op7418/CodePilot

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
